fields.name: AdditionalData
fields.description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

fields.name: AlertDisplayName
fields.description: The display name of the alert.

fields.name: AlertLink
fields.description: The uri link of the alert.

fields.name: AlertType
fields.description: The type name of the alert.

fields.name: CompromisedEntity
fields.description: Display name of the main entity being reported on.

fields.name: ConfidenceLevel
fields.description: The confidence level of this alert.

fields.name: ConfidenceReasons
fields.description: The confidence reasons

fields.name: ConfidenceScore
fields.description: The confidence score of the alert.

fields.name: ConfidenceScoreStatus
fields.description: The confidence score calculation status, i.e. indicating if score calculation is pending for this alert, not applicable or final.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Alert description.

fields.name: EndTimeUtc
fields.description: The impact end time of the alert (the time of the last event contributing to the alert).

fields.name: FriendlyName
fields.description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

fields.name: Intent
fields.description: Holds the alert intent stage(s) mapping for this alert.

fields.name: ProcessingEndTime
fields.description: The time the alert was made available for consumption.

fields.name: ProductComponentName
fields.description: The name of a component inside the product which generated the alert.

fields.name: ProductName
fields.description: The name of the product which published this alert.

fields.name: ProductVersion
fields.description: The version of the product generating the alert.

fields.name: ProviderAlertId
fields.description: The identifier of the alert inside the product which generated the alert.

fields.name: RemediationSteps
fields.description: Manual action items to take to remediate the alert.

fields.name: ResourceIdentifiers
fields.description: The list of resource identifiers of the alert.

fields.name: StartTimeUtc
fields.description: The impact start time of the alert (the time of the first event contributing to the alert).

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The lifecycle status of the alert.

fields.name: SystemAlertId
fields.description: Holds the product identifier of the alert for the product.

fields.name: Tactics
fields.description: The tactics of the alert

fields.name: TimeGenerated
fields.description: The time the alert was generated.

fields.name: VendorName
fields.description: The name of the vendor that raise the alert.
